text: Tranny Fag () is a 2018 Brazilian documentary film directed by Claudia Priscilla and Kiko Goifman about Linn da Quebrada, a transgender Brazilian musician and activist whose tactics for confronting homophobia and transphobia include performing in the nude."Linn da Quebrada é estrela de sua história em ‘Bixa Travesty’". Veja, February 21, 2018."Documentário ‘Bixa Travesty’, com a MC Linn da Quebrada, estreia no Festival de Berlim de 2018". A Gambiarra, January 29, 2018. The film had its theatrical premiere at the 2018 Berlin International Film Festival,"Brazilian Women Producers Make a Splash in Berlin". Variety, February 15, 2018. where it won a Teddy Award as the best LGBTQ-themed documentary film of the festival."Berlin: 'Hard Paint' Wins Teddy Award for Best LGBTQ Feature". The Hollywood Reporter, 23 February 2018. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2018 films Category:2018 documentary films Category:Brazilian films Category:Brazilian documentary films Category:Portuguese-language films Category:Brazilian LGBT-related films Category:Transgender-related documentary films Category:2018 LGBT-related films
title: Tranny Fag
